Nov. 20, 2010 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Second Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-second-section
Test Piece Contest
A Salford Sinfonietta
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Prizes - 1st £350, 2nd £250, 3rd £150. 4 bands competed.
July 1, 2020, 9:33 p.m. July 1, 2020, 9:38 p.m.
1 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Gareth Ritter
2 Cross Keys Silver Band Kerry Bowden
3 Gwaun-cae-Gurwen Band Glyn Rhys Davies
4 Upper Rhondda Brass Band Patrick O'Leary
Withdrawn Briton Ferry Band Christian Jenkins
